if you wish to use x11 graphical capabilities from apple terminal, add 
this at the end of your .bash_profile:




if [ -z "${DISPLAY}" ];then echo -n
export DISPLAY=':0'
fi




...  you will be able to use ximage in terminal.app and see images 
through x11.




cheers,
pillo
